title: Shang Dynasty Bronze Vessel Print Tie
description:
Tie developed from Wine Bucket (Xiao Chen Xi you), late Shang dynasty (13th–11th century BC).

Second millennium style for the 21st century. This silk twill tie is inspired by a bronze ritual wine vessel “Xiao Chen Xi You” and designed exclusively for the Art Institute’s exhibition Mirroring the Past: China’s Emperors, Scholars and Their Bronze Collections.

  • Dimensions: 3 x 60 in.
  • Materials: Silk
  • Dry clean only.
